generated_description: erco congress, legally known as erco congress srl., is a company based in capri, campania, specializing in event rental and technical assistance. founded in the mid-1980s, the company has extensive experience in the conference, event, and meeting sectors. erco congress provides services such as simultaneous interpretation, video projections, video mapping, led walls, lighting systems, and conference systems. the company has expanded its operations throughout italy.
